xml.name: command
xml.command:
iqtree
-pre PREF -nt AUTO -redo
#if $general_options.s -s '$general_options.s' #end if
#if $general_options.st -st '$general_options.st' #end if
#if $general_options.t -t '$general_options.t' #end if
#if $general_options.te -te '$general_options.te' #end if
#if $general_options.seed -seed $general_options.seed #end if
$general_options.keep_ident $general_options.safe
#if $likelihood_mapping.lmap -lmap $likelihood_mapping.lmap #end if
#if $likelihood_mapping.lmclust -lmclust '$likelihood_mapping.lmclust' #end if
$likelihood_mapping.wql
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cond_model.m -m '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cond_model.m' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.rcluster -rcluster $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.rcluster #end if
#if str( $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mset ) != "": -mset '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mset' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.msub -msub '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.msub' #end if
#if str( $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mfreq ) != "": -mfreq '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mfreq' #end if
#if str( $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mrate ) != "": -mrate '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mrate' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cmin -cmin $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cmin #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cmax -cmax $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.cmax #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.merit -merit '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.merit' #end if
$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mtree
#if str( $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.madd ) != "": -madd '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.madd' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mdef -mdef '$modelling_parameters.automatic_model.mdef' #end if
$modelling_parameters.specifying_substitution.mwopt
#if str( $modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.a ) != "": -a '$modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.a' #end if
$modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.gmedian
#if str( $modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.i ) != "": -i '$modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.i' #end if
$modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.opt_gamma_inv $modelling_parameters.rate_heterogeneity.wsr
#if $modelling_parameters.partition_model.q -q '$modelling_parameters.partition_model.q' #end if
$modelling_parameters.partition_model.spp
#if $modelling_parameters.partition_model.sp -sp '$modelling_parameters.partition_model.sp' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.site_specific_frequency.ft -ft '$modelling_parameters.site_specific_frequency.ft' #end if
#if $modelling_parameters.site_specific_frequency.fs -fs $modelling_parameters.site_specific_frequency.fs #end if
$modelling_parameters.site_specific_frequency.fmax
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.ninit -ninit $tree_parameters.tree_search.ninit #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.ntop -ntop $tree_parameters.tree_search.ntop #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.nbest -nbest $tree_parameters.tree_search.nbest #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.nstop -nstop $tree_parameters.tree_search.nstop #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.n -n $tree_parameters.tree_search.n #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.sprrad -sprrad $tree_parameters.tree_search.sprrad #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.pers -pers $tree_parameters.tree_search.pers #end if
$tree_parameters.tree_search.allnni $tree_parameters.tree_search.djc
#if $tree_parameters.tree_search.g -g '$tree_parameters.tree_search.g' #end if
#if $tree_parameters.single_branch.alrt -alrt $tree_parameters.single_branch.alrt #end if
$tree_parameters.single_branch.abayes
#if $tree_parameters.single_branch.lbp -lbp $tree_parameters.single_branch.lbp #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_topology.z -z '$tree_parameters.tree_topology.z' #end if
#if $tree_parameters.tree_topology.zb -zb $tree_parameters.tree_topology.zb #end if
$tree_parameters.tree_topology.zw $tree_parameters.tree_topology.au
$tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.con $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.net
#if $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.minsup -minsup $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.minsup #end if
#if $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.bi -bi $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.bi #end if
#if $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.sup -sup '$tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.sup' #end if
#if str( $tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.suptag ) != "": -suptag '$tree_parameters.constructing_consensus.suptag' #end if
#if $tree_parameters.computing_robinson_foulds.rf -rf '$tree_parameters.computing_robinson_foulds.rf' #end if
$tree_parameters.computing_robinson_foulds.rf_all $tree_parameters.computing_robinson_foulds.rf_adj
#if $tree_parameters.generating_random.r -r $tree_parameters.generating_random.r #end if
$tree_parameters.generating_random.ru $tree_parameters.generating_random.rcat $tree_parameters.generating_random.rbal $tree_parameters.generating_random.rcsg
#if str( $tree_parameters.generating_random.rlen ) != "": -rlen '$tree_parameters.generating_random.rlen' #end if
#if $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bb -bb $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bb #end if
$bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.wbt $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.wbtl
#if $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.nm -nm $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.nm #end if
#if $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bcor -bcor $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bcor #end if
#if $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.nstep -nstep $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.nstep #end if
#if $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.beps -beps $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.beps #end if
#if str( $bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bspec ) != "": -bspec '$bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bspec' #end if
$bootstrap_parameters.ultrafast_bootstrap.bnni
#if $bootstrap_parameters.nonparametric_bootstrap.b -b $bootstrap_parameters.nonparametric_bootstrap.b #end if
$bootstrap_parameters.nonparametric_bootstrap.bc $bootstrap_parameters.nonparametric_bootstrap.bo
#if str( $miscellaneous_options.fconst ) != "": -fconst '$miscellaneous_options.fconst' #end if
